description: Bilingual §86a StGB critical terms for pre-translation and post-LLM override filtering
usage: Used in Stage 1 execute_stage1_safety_unified() for: (1) Pre-translation fast-filter (§86a instant block), (2) Post-LLM hard filter to override US-trained model decisions. Only terms for detected input language + EN are checked.
rationale: US-trained LLMs may be too permissive with historical Nazi/terrorist content. This post-filter acts as a safety net to catch symbols that slip through cultural/historical context reasoning.

stage1_critical_86a.description: Critical §86a StGB terms (German Law) that MUST be blocked - structured by language for selective checking
stage1_critical_86a.legal_reference: §86a StGB (Germany) - Use of symbols of unconstitutional and terrorist organizations

note: This is a CRITICAL subset for POST-FILTER OVERRIDE. When the safety LLM says 'SAFE' but translated text contains these terms, OVERRIDE to BLOCKED. This catches cases where US-trained models might allow historical/educational context that violates German law §86a StGB.
